headline: Fund-Raising and Dealmaking Will Dominate Private Asset Managersâ€™ Earnings
summary: Blackstone, KKR, Apollo Global Management and Brookfield are getting ready to report quarterly earnings.

headline: Apollo Took Loss on Asset-Backed Loan Deemed Safe
summary: Apollo Global Management took a loss on a portion of a $170 million asset-backed financing for Amazon brand aggregator Perch that was written off to zero. Silas Brown has more on "Bloomberg Open Interest."

headline: My Ultimate Contrarian Bet For 2026: Blue Owl Capital
summary: Blue Owl Capital has faced negative sentiment from some investors. Read why more consideration should be given to this dividend-paying asset manager.
